name: PowerBall: Monster’s Quest
overview: Once upon a time there was a humble young man and a princess who fell in love. They wanted to marry but the King did not accept this union. So he cast a spell on the young man which transformed him into a monster. The poor princess was confined in the castle to arrange a marriage of convenience with a prince of great wealth. The only option for the young monster to get his princess back is to defeat the King by playing PowerBall and prove his worth. Will love triumph over the King's evil plans?
